item.title: Emacs Config Redo - Evil & Use-Package
item.description: After switching to Spacemacs for the last year or two, it’s about time to back and pull togeather my own emacs configuration again. However, spacemacs has shown me several packages that I want to incorporate into my new emacs setup. Rather than resuruct and Frankenstein the changes into my old .emacs file… I’m starting from scratch.
